snippet.title: Pine | Official PC Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Pine is out on Steam (Windows, Mac, Linux), Kartridge (Windows, Mac) and GOG (Windows, Mac, Linux) NOW!
- Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1042780/Pine/
- Kartridge: https://kartridge.com/games/Twirlbound/pine
- GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/pine

We can hardly believe it, but it's finally out. Have fun playing and join us on Discord to discuss it!
https://discord.gg/pinegame

Pine is an open world action-adventure simulation game. Set in the beautiful world of Albamare, you take on the role of Hue, a smart young adult who will have to explore, trade and fight his way through a stirring ecology filled with creatures much smarter than humans.

JOIN OUR DISCORD: https://discord.gg/pinegame
FOLLOW US ON TWITTER: https://twitter.com/Twirlbound
LIKE US ON FACEBOOK: https://facebook.com/twirlbound
FOLLOW ON INSTAGRAM: https://instagram.com/twirlboundofficial
JOIN OUR REDDIT: https://reddit.com/r/pinegame

After 4 years, the 7 of us at Twirlbound and the team over at Tumult Kollektiv are beyond excited to finally give it to you and have you explore the intricacies of the world and systems that we built.
